Posts.Content: Bless you...I can so relate, I go through times I just want to cry!!! I know it will only make me feel worse, but we have to release it somehow. I haven't tried the screaming, I think I might!!!! I still have no appetite and get so tired just from the most simple things. We have to keep telling ourselves, it will get better....Stay in touch...Lotz of good compasion I am sending your way!!!!!! Denice
Posts.Title: Feel crap!

Posts.Content: hang in there....It will get easier. I went through my first chemos back this summer.At timesit feels so overwhelming. Stay tough, remember this part of it is temporary.I am in the middle of radiation right now..If I can do it, you can..I hope you are feeling better now...stay in touch. Remeber you are not alone, I am always here to help!
Posts.Title: Feel crap!

Posts.Content: Bless her heart!!!! It is a tough road, but never give up! I have been fighting since March 2012, and my first diagnosis was so overwhelming. Stick with what your drs are recommending and fight your way through it everyday. I can finally see a finish line.
Posts.Title: need some positive feedback
